dublinCore.title: p5.js Execution Model
dublinCore.creator: Claude AI
dublinCore.subject: Programming
dublinCore.description: Step-through flowchart showing p5.js program execution: page loads, setup() runs once, then draw() loops continuously at 60fps. Event handlers can trigger anytime.

learningObjectives: Explain the p5.js execution model and the role of setup() vs draw()
Trace the flow from page load through continuous animation
Identify when event handlers execute relative to the draw loop

controls.label: Next Step
controls.description: Advance to the next execution phase
